amendment.description: Page 429, after line 4, insert the following: "(16) CHRONIC WASTING DISEASE- Research and extension grants may be made under this section for projects relating to treating, mitigating, or eliminating chronic wasting disease.". Page 429, line 5, strike "(16)" and insert "(17)".
amendment.purpose: Amendment numbered 9 printed in Part C of House Report 115-677 to add Chronic Wasting Disease to Sec. 7208, High-Priority Research and Extension Initiatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thompson (PA) amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Thompson (PA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Thompson (PA) amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
